Resolve nodes or indices

dot-resolve_idx_adjustment.Rd

Internal helper to resolve nodes or indices.

Usage

.resolve_idx_adjustment(
  cg,
  nodes,
  index,
  what,
  allow_empty = FALSE,
  env = parent.frame()
)

Arguments

cg

A caugi_graph object.

nodes

Node selector: character vector of names or unquoted expression (supports + and c()). Exclusive with index.

index

Optional numeric 1-based indices (exclusive with nodes).

what

Character; description of what is being resolved (for error messages).

allow_empty

Logical; if TRUE, allows both nodes and index to be missing/NULL, returning integer(0).

Value

Integer vector of 0-based indices.
